title: [K-12] Collaborative Learning Analysis-Based Team Project Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and team project experience
context.additional_context: PBL-based operation monitoring and improving team dynamics through real-time collaborative learning data analysis using digital devices, with language curriculum-integrated projects

learning_goals: Learners can analyze collaborative learning log data to assess individual contributions within teams with 80% accuracy.
Based on analysis results, learners can reflect on their communication patterns and develop improvement plans.
Through three or more data-driven feedback sessions during team projects, learners can enhance collaboration efficiency by over 25%.

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
